resources.string: Fallout Terminal Solver
Welcome to the Fallout Terminal Solver! Choose one of the methods below to begin automatically solving a puzzle.
Take a picture!
Enter text manually
Add a new word
Ensure that all of the words below are correct, then press the SOLVE button below.
SOLVE
List of words used to solve the puzzle
Add a word
The list is empty. Try adding some words!
OK
Cancel
Add
Update
Press solve again to get the next best word to pick.
At least one of the words contains non-letter characters! Please edit that word and retry solving.
At least of the words in the list has a different size than the rest! Please edit that word and retry solving.
The number of words in the list is too low for automatic solving to be useful.
Type a word to add to the list.
Try the word above, then input the number of matching letters the game gives you and press OK.
Could not parse that number. Please press solve and try again.
